title: I want the house he want to file bankrupse
question: help
answers: Filing a bankruptcy case does not mean you lose the house. You will lose the house if you do not pay the required loan payments. Assuming your equity in the house is less than the amount you can exempt in the bankruptcy case, the bankruptcy trustee will not be interested in your house. The bankruptcy filing by your husband will stop any pending sale of your home until the bank asks the bankruptcy court for permission to sell the home at an auction.
